created_time: November 19, 2022, 09:13:46 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 12:51:22 AM by gensol
content: Hello HuntersThis campaign has been put on hold Once the pending discussions with the team is resolved, the campaign will be reopened Solaris will be at the forefront of the solar power revolution. Over the coming years with the rising costs of fuel, solar power will be one of the main resources used to power our homes, offices and even our cryptocurrency mining farms. Here at Solaris, we are working closely with developers who already design and build solar power solutions around the world. From lithium batteries, inverters to powerwalls our dedicated team have all angle coveredSolaris is starting its Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with Solaris tokensCode:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONBTT UsernameBTT Profile LinkTelegram UsernameParticipated CampaignsBEP20 Address FOLLOW BOUNTY TWITTER HANDLE| SPREADSHEET|WEEK 1: 19/11/2022 - 25/11/2022WEEK 2: 26/11/2022 - 02/2/2022General Rule: To be eligible for any campaign, everyone must subscribe to SolarisEnergy social media handles and the bounty twitter account. Anyone caught abusing any of the campaign rules will be restricted from the campaign. Activities should be submitted on a weekly basis on the forum thread.•  To be eligible for this campaign, min friend count is 50.•  Follow Solaris on Twitter•  Tweet about Solaris project or retweet Solaris official tweet, tweets must have at least 3 of the following tags: #ENERGY #MINING  #INVESTMENT #CRYPTO #BLOCKCHAIN  #DEFI•  Minimum of 4 tweets/retweets per week.•  Links to tweets/retweet must be reported every week on the thread.•  Twitter audit must pass 85%50-100 Followers/Friends:          2 stake101-300 Followers/Friends:        4 stakes500-1500 Followers/Friends:      6 stakes1600-4000 Followers/Friends:    8 stakes  4001+ Followers/Friends:         10 stakesFollow Solaris: TWITTER|Fill this form:  HERE|•  To be eligible for this campaign, min friend count is 250.•  Follow Solaris on Facebook, share and like all Solaris posts.•  Make posts about Solaris project or retweet Solaris official tweet, tweets must have at least 3 of the following tags: #ENERGY #MINING  #INVESTMENT #CRYPTO #BLOCKCHAIN  #DEFI•  Minimum of 4 tweets/retweets per week.•  Links to tweets/retweet must be reported every week on the thread.250-500 Followers/Friends:      2 stake501-1500 Followers/Friends:     4 stakes1501-4500 Followers/Friends:   6 stakes4501-6000 Followers/Friends:   8 stakes  6001+ Followers/Friends:        10 stakesFollow Solaris: FACEBOOK|Fill this form:  HERE|Earn tokens by blogging about Solaris, and promoting it in other forums such as Steemit, your Facebook or LinkedIn groups, medium, and other social outlets with extensive outreach.•  Only original content will be accepted•  Rewards are based on creativity, audience, and quality•  Contents with plagiarism won’t be accepted•  Blogs must be focused on relevant topics concerning the Solaris project•  Blog post should have a minimum of 250 words•  Blogs in other languages will be accepted only based on audience and pre-approval by the team.•  Solaris official links such as website, whitepaper, and Telegram must be contained in the blogs or videos•  Max of 1 article is accepted per person.1. Normal quality: 20 stakes 2. Good quality: 50 stakes 3. Very good quality: 75 stakes4. Excellent quality: 100 stakesFill this form:  HERE|Follow Solaris on InstagramLike all Solaris posts, and engage with commentsFollow Solaris: INSTAGRAM|Fill this form:  HERE|This campaign is for telegram membersTo be part of this campaign:• Wear Solari's official image as your telegram display picture, use solarisproject.energy as your extension name, make 5 constructive comments in Solaris group and 5 comments in other telegram groups• You will be required to make reports of your work on a weekly basis on the form• Using Solaris to spam your channels will not be allowed as wellJoin Solaris: TELEGRAM GROUP|Fill this form:  HERE|
